creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the artist
description: seated elderly woman with wild white hair pulled back; pink blouse; blue coat with blue and pink crisscrossing stripes; quilt made of pink, white, and lavender squares over her lap; woman holds three paint brushes in PL hand and tall cane in PR hand; large plant with pink blossoms behind woman
markings: LRC, red stamp: (red bird shaped seal); bottom center, in pencil: [66]
signed: LRC, in pencil: [Micah 1981]; LLC, in black print: [Homage to Fujiob Yoshida]
title: Homage to Fujio
